attributes.additional_details:
Sign This petition to see a new bus stop on cobden road southport England please sign to putfoward our plans to create a new bus stop on main cobden road

this bus stop if created will occupie such services as the No.16 and other busses pass through cobden road

people of southport think that we do need a bus stop on cobden road as buses pass through there but do not stop and most residents round the are are eldely and cannot walk either way to other bus stops located in the area

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
